102 
103 // Return the number of vertices
107 inline uint PolyhedronMesh::getNbVertices() const {
108  return mHalfEdgeStructure.getNbVertices();
109 }
110 
111 // Return the number of faces
115 inline uint PolyhedronMesh::getNbFaces() const {
116  return mHalfEdgeStructure.getNbFaces();
117 }
118 
119 // Return a face normal
124 inline Vector3 PolyhedronMesh::getFaceNormal(uint faceIndex) const {
125  assert(faceIndex < mHalfEdgeStructure.getNbFaces());
126  return mFacesNormals[faceIndex];
127 }
128 
129 // Return the half-edge structure of the mesh
133 inline const HalfEdgeStructure& PolyhedronMesh::getHalfEdgeStructure() const {
134  return mHalfEdgeStructure;
135 }
136 
137 // Return the centroid of the polyhedron
141 inline Vector3 PolyhedronMesh::getCentroid() const {
142  return mCentroid;
143 }
144 
145 }
